education.thesis: Quickest Change Detection under Post-change Non-stationarity and Uncertainty

work.name: The Ohio State University
work.summary: Focused on diffusion models, sampling convergence, Bayesian methods, and non-parametric uncertainties in generative models.

work.name: Coordinated Science Laboratory, UIUC
work.summary: Developed robust quickest change detection algorithms and Bayesian anomaly detection techniques under distributional uncertainty and non-stationarity.
